text: Chapter 9, Invent Home Table. Then nothing happened for awhile. Our vacation duration was coming to a close. Checked everything off the list, And then some. I finished the mystery novel, It was, afterall, the bellhop.

Wonderment regarding– The Valentine Mob Bubbles gave us each a special phone, If we ever needed to connect. So we did. We called Lucille. Voicemail. We decided against leaving a message. A few moments later my friend’s phone buzzed. Everything ok? Asked Chaplin. Yeah,
said my friend. Ok, we’re gathering you up tonight, be ready. My friend and I hiding our excitement said, Ok. Great then, said Chaplin, ciao.
